long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Extension to enable One-Click creation of Social Media Cards.

Install this extension then from any webpage click the Tweesky Button to create the Social Media card.

## About Tweesky ###############

From any URL a preview card is generated reading the available (Twitter and OpenGraph) metadata. Before sharing it the card can be edited adjusting the title, improving the description and changing the image which will be displayed to the Social Media users.

tweesky.online offers a rich gallery of beautiful photos as well as the option to define the cover image.

Tweesky offers a special integration with Spotify URLs to share artists, albums and playlists.
